p: 200 g fresh flowers of Chamomile were homogenized and mixed in a mixer with ethanol (70%), followed by extensive maceration with alcohol (70%). Filtrate of this extract was evaporated through rotary evaporator and final residue (solvent free) was suspended in water (12.5 g in 40 ml distilled water) ( Joshi et al., 2008: Sing et al., 2011). Aqueous extract can be mixed with glycerin to convert into hand rub.
